title: Headstone, Marker, or Decorating Graves allowed in Islam
transcript: from pakistan is it permissible to come to the grave after one year and then decorate it and put marbles and a headstone etc this is all an innovation it has to be leveled with the ground only maybe a less than a foot with sand without putting any cement without putting any marbles or headstones to decorate it like the christians this is totally prohibited
